sentence.Network_en: The metal is then minutely examined to ensure there are no cracks.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后仔细检查了这块金属，以确保没有裂缝。

sentence.Network_en: They follow minutely the news from abroad on Cable News Network.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们密切追踪有线电视新闻网上的国外新闻。

sentence.Network_en: The benefit of an x-ray far outweighs the minutely increased risk of cancer.
sentence.Network_cn: X光的好处远远大于其在很小程度上增加的罹患癌症的风险。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... minute 分 minutely 详细地 minuteness 微小.
三人每班是啥意思 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... [everyday;daily;each day] 天天 [minutely] 每分钟;每一时刻 [everywhere] 到处,各处.
TOEFL+21天 ... minuscule a 极小的，微小的，细微的 minutely ad 详细地，精密地 mission n 使命，任务，天职.
GRE填空单词之精简版--填空-GRE-英语-育龙网 ... midst n。 中间 minutely ad。 详细地，精密地，每分钟地 mirror n。 镜子，写真， …

list.abs: 汽车英语_百度文库 ... Manoeuvrable 操纵灵活的 Meeting Minutes 会议纪要 Member 横梁.
bye , I looked in upon them five minutes ago ., 顺便告诉你 , 我是五分钟前进去看见他们的.
听电影学英语:贫民窟的百万富翁 14 - 听力课堂 ... Yah. 好 Two minutes. 两分钟 Dial this number...now. 马上拨打这支电话.
At the end of ten minutes the bandit made them a sign to stop., 走了十分钟 , 那强盗示意叫他们停步.

entry.def: You use minutely to indicate that something is done in great detail.

example.ex: The metal is then minutely examined to ensure there are no cracks...
example.tran: 然后仔细检查了这块金属，以确保没有裂缝。

example.ex: They follow minutely the news from abroad on Cable News Network.
example.tran: 他们密切追踪有线电视新闻网上的国外新闻。

entry.def: You use minutely to indicate that the size or extent of something is very small.

example.ex: The benefit of an x-ray far outweighs the minutely increased risk of cancer.
example.tran: X光的好处远远大于其在很小程度上增加的罹患癌症的风险。

sentences.sentence: "our inability to see everything minutely and clearly is due merely to the infirmity of our senses"

auth_sentence.content: Ford Madox Brown was an histrionic painter of minutely detailed narratives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ford Madox Brown was an histrionic painter of minutely detailed narratives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ford Madox Brown was an histrionic painter of minutely detailed narratives.

auth_sentence.content: Their epic yet minutely humane narrative sweep?
auth_sentence.res_content: Their epic yet minutely humane narrative sweep?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their epic yet minutely humane narrative sweep?

auth_sentence.content: No need to study them minutely; a glance will give the flavour.
auth_sentence.res_content: No need to study them minutely; a glance will give the flavour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No need to study them minutely; a glance will give the flavour.
